content: @cjgillot In https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/79519, where did you ensure that attributes end up in the crate hash?
Since the attributes are stored in a side table, finalize_and_compute_crate_hash will no longer hash attributes when it hashes bodies
Sorry, I forgot to hash them. Making a PR.
Someone opened an issue that seemed to be caused by this, though I've been unable to build a minimal reproducer from scratch
